response.name: micturition
response.feedback: Correct. The process of urination is referred to as micturition.

response.name: urethra
response.feedback: Correct: The entire process of urination begins with blood carrying various wastes entering each of the two kidneys through the renal artery and ends when urine exits out of the body through the urethra.

During the process, urine leaves each kidney through each ureter and is driven to the bladder.
